page.title: 07TRANSPORT
page.content: Although for many years a stop on a through route from Bristol to Swindon the village is now dependent on{local {bus services}.From Monday to Saturday there are 5 services to Malmesbury 4 to Yate and 2 to Swindon.Chippenham can be reached twice on Fridays (market day)Bristol twice a week and Bath once. Of 50 families who replied to a questionaire only 1 did not have a {car}.27 of the fathers and 16 of the mothers use the car to get to work,but some used transport provided by their employers.One father used a tractor and 1 used a bus.10 mothers use cycles to get to work as do 3 fathers. There were 109{cycles}, mostly used by children though several cases families cycled as such.Horses , dinghies,inflatables and sailboards were used for leisure purposes.
